title: Nanoscale strides: exploring innovative therapies for breast cancer treatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14017-14040
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02639J, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sruthi Laakshmi Mugundhan, Mothilal Mohan
Nanotechnology revolutionizes breast cancer treatment by improving drug delivery, overcoming barriers, and reducing side effects. This review highlights its potential and superiority over conventional methods, transforming breast cancer management.
